nodes.text: Graffiti Square was a plaza in Black Sun territory on the Republic capital of Coruscant during the Cold War. Located in the territory of the Black Sun criminal syndicate, the square was controlled by the gang, and had fallen into disrepair by 3643 BBY. Despite the gang presence and the general downtrodden feeling in the area, the Silent Sun cantina continued to draw patrons from both citizens and criminals.

Graffiti Square is a subzone of the Black Sun Territory map on Coruscant in the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, and features many Black Sun members as enemies. The area is also notable for containing one of the game's datacrons: namely, Datacron 04: King Adas, a green Endurance datacron, located on one of the upper terraces of the area.
